sentences.english: So the chemo finished. Then, blood began to appear in the patient's urine.
sentences.chinese: 后来，化疗结束以后，病人出现了血尿。

sentences.english: Shenzhen's inhabitants' blood uric acid values are showing a tendency to increase.
sentences.chinese: 深圳人血尿酸值有逐渐上升趋势。

sentences.english: Hematuria in patients with high blood pressure is higher than normal acid normal.
sentences.chinese: 高血压患者的血尿酸水平常高于正常人。

sentences.english: Hematuria and the waist abdomen ache is its main clinical symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 血尿和腰腹部疼痛为其主要临床症状。

sentences.english: Some cases of severe and chronic haematuria may develop blood loss anaemia.
sentences.chinese: 在长期严重血尿的病例会发展失血性贫血。

sentences.english: A 71-year-old female presented with painless gross hematuria for 2 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 一位71岁女性因无痛性血尿就诊。

sentences.english: Objective To study the correlation between coronary heart disease and blood uric acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究冠心病与血尿酸的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of serum uric acid on different type of coronary heart disease in the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血尿酸在不同类型老年冠心病发生中的作用。

sentences.english: There was no correlation between blood uric acid and fibrinogen.
sentences.chinese: 血尿酸和血浆纤维蛋白原二者间无相关性。

sentences.english: No complications occurred except for 3 cases of mild transient hematuria.
sentences.chinese: 除3例有一过性淡血尿外，余无并发症。

sentences.english: Cases are associated with painless gross hematuria and urinary tract infection.
sentences.chinese: 此种病人有可能合并发生无痛性血尿和泌尿道感染。

sentences.english: Follow-up of 9 months showed no recurrence of hematuria by anti-tuberculous treatment.
sentences.chinese: 经抗结核治疗9个月，随访至今无血尿复发。

sentences.english: It also affects my liver and my kidney sometimes. There may be blood either in my urine or out of the other end.
sentences.chinese: 有时候觉得肝肾功能受到了影响，会出现血尿或血便。

sentences.english: All animals died or were euthanized because of severe uremia.
sentences.chinese: 因为血尿病情严重，所有动物或病死或实施安乐死。

sentences.english: Objective To study major factors of the adverse drug reaction(ADR)on hematuria induced by cefradine for injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探寻注射用头孢拉定引发血尿不良反应的原因。

sentences.english: The patients in the treatment group were treated with allopurinol or benzbromarone to control their uric acid to the normal range.
sentences.chinese: 治疗组患者予别嘌呤醇控制血尿酸于正常范围内。

definition: occult blood (in medicine, fecal blood from internal bleeding)
